properties.math: R(X, Y)Z = nabla_X nabla_Y Z - nabla_Y nabla_X Z - nabla_[X,Y] Z
properties.input_constraints: Piecewise constant sectional curvature on simplices.

singularity_check.logic: If Sectional_Curvature > K_max or < K_min, flag as 'Singularity Risk'.

bianchi_identity_violation.logic: Check Second Bianchi Identity: nabla_X R(Y,Z) + nabla_Y R(Z,X) + nabla_Z R(X,Y) = 0
